question: I hope someone could help me in here.1.  Before lunch, my blood glucose fall to 3.9.  Dr said, take half a tablet of MiniDiab after food.  If skip a meal then can skip the med.  Now I'm taking lunch for blood glucose falling too low.  Do I still need to take half a tablet of MiniDiab after lunch?2.  Is chest tightness part of the diabetes symptoms?3.  Can Ezetrol mix with Grapefruit drinks?  I heard Cholestrol med can't mix with Grapefruit products.  Is it true?Thanks
title: When not to take MiniDiab?
